about_the_game:
Action Packed, Extraction Teamplay

Choose a character from our growing roster of Seekers, gear up with whatever you’ve got, and get ready for adventure.

You’ll team up in groups of up to three and head out on expeditions in the Everbloom. Find loot by taking down creatures, opening treasure chests, and plucking it off enemy players you bested in battle. Make sure you make it out alive because you only keep what you extract with.

Build up your stash across matches, and use coins and crafting materials to bolster your supplies. As you grow stronger, you can travel deeper into the map, fighting progressively stronger creatures and eventually taking on bosses who guard the most powerful items.

With in-game events, randomly-selected regions, and unpredictable enemy players, each match plays out differently. Use your knowledge, Seeker mastery, and the power of teamwork to collect the goods and make it out alive.

Features

  • Approachable extraction gameplay that lets you jump in and make progress quickly, with a high skill ceiling so you can master your Seeker and strategy over time

  • Team of up in groups of up to three and compete with up to 24 players each match for loot

  • Discover secret passages, events, and surprises in the Everbloom, a large map with randomly selected regions each match

  • Earn gold and crafting materials, which you keep regardless of survival. Spend these resources to purchase, empower, and craft the perfect equipment for your Seeker.

  • Uncover gems with unique, game-changing passives that you can add to your gear

  • Venture into the Heart of the Forest to defeat the biggest bosses and escape with the best loot

short_description: Seekers of Skyveil combines the high-octane moments of extraction with brawly teamfights and action RPG gameplay. Choose a Seeker that fits your style, battle enemies, and uncover powerful loot. And make sure to make it out alive or all will be lost to the Aurastorm.
